description: Configuration for ServiceTitan v2 Reference Dimension Ingestors
scheduleDescription: Daily at 3 AM (after entity ingestors complete)

bigquery.description: ServiceTitan Reference Dimensions - ID to Name Lookups

notes: Reference tables use full refresh (not incremental) to ensure completeness
Small datasets (<1000 records each) so full refresh is fast and safe
Scheduled after entity ingestors to ensure latest references are available
No partitioning needed due to small table sizes
Clustering on 'active' and key fields for efficient filtering
